title: sagarbansal21
author: sagarbansal21
content: This week we had an amazing session with the Business Development Manager of Koakuma, Lance Tan, discussing the GameFi space.Tune in to listen to the recap here: https://open.spotify.com/episode/0TkK6urBffggFYjrp3MLly?si=AWFwKdxhQGm58BFZb47ITg&nd=1

comments.author: sagarbansal21
comments.body: Do you know where the markets are heading? This week Kevin Murcko, Founder of Coin Metro, a fully regulated crypto exchange for beginners and pros, is in discussion with AdLunam's team on Twitter Spaces.When: Dec 8th, 2:00pm CETJoin here: https://twitter.com/i/spaces/1gqxvyDVmLeJB
